content.query:
-- OPENROWSET runs in the default master database. There are no objects like tables involved.
-- Simple
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://4dnsynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales_small/csv/customers*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- With Mapping
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://4dnsynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales_small/csv/customers*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
WITH (
    Id INT,
    FirstName VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    LastName VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    CompanyName VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    StreetName VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    Number INT,
    City VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    Region VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    Country VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
) AS [result]
